introduction: A look at the highlights and impact of some the world's greatest, ground breaking and influential designers of the 20th Century. Featuring contributions from the UK's leading fashion writers and journalists we find out the stories behind these characters who lay the foundation for modern fashion we experience today.EPISODE 1 -- Stella McCartneyEPISODE 2 -- VersaceEPISODE 3 -- Calvin KleinEPISODE 4 -- ArmaniEPISODE 5 -- Karl LagerfeldEPISODE 6 -- Ralph LaurenEPISODE 7 -- Vivienne WestwoodEPISODE 8 -- Mary Quant
